comment.author: 92803452@N04
comment._content: This is now President's House, St Ann's, Port of Spain. Each President of the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago lives there, with his family. He hosts other Heads of State and Dignitaries, functions of State, etc, at this address. It is next to the Emperor Valley Zoo, St Ann's, Port of Spain.

comment.author: 92803452@N04
comment._content: President's House is one of the 'Magnificient Seven' landmark buildings which are situated around the World's Largest Roundabout, the Queen's Park Savannah.
